hero.headline: Backcountry camp essentials
hero.tagline: Lightweight and technical gear to take a walk on the wild side, then sleep there too.

promos.text: Feeling the urge to explore? A little pedalling opens up your world.
Go-to shoes for hard redpoints or all-day routes, plus rock pro, harnesses, bouldering gear and chalk.
Sizzling savings for summer weekends. Limited quantities.
Snap up special deals on Salomon. Ends July 5, while quantities last.
